<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preach'd at St. Michael Crooked-Lane September the 8th. 1700 Upon occasion of the death of His Illustrious Highness the Duke of Gloucester· By James Gardiner, M.A. rector of the said parish. Gardiner, James, 1637-1705.
28 p.
printed by Hugh Newman, at the Grashopper in the Poultry, London : MDCC. [1700]
Half-title: Mr. Gardiner's Sermon on the death of the Duke of Gloucester. Running title reads: A sermon on the death of the Duke of Gloucester. Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
=======
A sermon preach'd at St. Michael Crooked-Lane September the 8th. 1700 Upon occasion of the death of His Illustrious Highness the Duke of Gloucester· By James Gardiner, M.A. rector of the said parish. Gardiner, James, 1637-1705.
28 p.
printed by Hugh Newman, at the Grashopper in the Poultry, London : MDCC. [1700]
Half-title: Mr. Gardiner's Sermon on the death of the Duke of Gloucester. Running title reads: A sermon on the death of the Duke of Gloucester. Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
Hugh Newman
the Grashopper in the Poultry
